name: Okendo Display Widgets v1.0
description:
Looking for an accurate reviews widget to embed into your designs?


Introducing the Okendo Display Widgets suite! A collection of components for displaying reviews which you can easily import into your own designs. Everything shown in these designs is exactly what you get when you first install Okendo for a Shopify store.


Check out some of the features available:

  • All components are fully responsive and use auto-layouts accordingly.
  • Supports two of our most used display layouts: Default and Featured Media (more to come!)
  • All components are pixel-perfect and true to the look of the actual embedded widgets.


What is Okendo?

3,500+ high-growth consumer brands trust Okendo to power their customer reviews, including many of the fastest-growing direct-to-consumer brands such as Netflix, SKIMS, LEGO, Fanjoy, Dashing Diva, Bite and Apt2b.


If you're an agency or consultant looking for a reviews partner, check out our Partner Program!
